projects.title: Wordle
projects.description: A re-thought challenge of the game wordle. Developed with react, vite, and firebase, this wordle clone rethinks the main mechanics of the game. Give it a try!

projects.title: Simply Text
projects.description: Simply Text is a group endevour. Me and my group members sought out to create a OCR application that transcribes nursing documentation into a database. This database is searchable and secure.
